trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around July 15th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson 7\15\2012 at approximately 8:15 p.m., my wife and i were standing on our deck behind our house. we both looked up and saw a oval shaped object with a red ring underneath it and three round lights along its keel. this object appeared to be approximately 3500 feet in the air, traveling west to east, in a straight line. as the object got closer to us my wife ran inside the house and brought out our 35mm camera with 30 power zoom. by the time i could get focused on the object, it was directly above us still traveling east, however the red ring and the 3 lights were no longer visible. the object had also changed shape to a cube and then to a cone of sorts. the object made no sound during the entire sighting. i was able to get a short video clip of this which i would like you to see. my wife saw a ufo several years ago while driving home late one night, however this is my first sighting. this object just suddenly disappeared from view. i ran out to the front of our house where i was clear of trees, but it was gone. i have no pictures, just the video clip
